alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 9:11PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lincoln and central McCormick Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 908 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bobby Brown State Park, or 15 miles southeast of Elberton, moving south at 30 mph. ...Boaters on Lake Strom Thurmond Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lincolnton, Elijah Clark State Park, Hamilton Branch State Park, Lake Strom Thurmond, Bobby Brown State Park, Bordeaux, Modoc, Knox Scout Reservation, Double Branches, Curry Hill, Chennault, Modoc Boat Ramp, Bussey Point Campground, New Hope, Hickory Knob State Resort Park, Loce, Gill`s Point, Hester`s Ferry Campground, Mount Carmel, and Baker Creek State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
